mapper.insert: insert into client(div, name,, item, person, email, phone_cell, phone_com, fax, address, bank, account_num, account_name, license_num, type1, type2, ceo, class) values( #{DIV}, #{NAME}, #{ITEM}, #{PERSON, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMAIL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE_CELL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE_COM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ADDRESS, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BANK, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ACCOUNT_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ACCOUNT_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LICENSE_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TYPE1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TYPE2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CEO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CLASS, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
